extendedInfo.description: Catch every minute of every game, every Sunday, anywhere with the updated NFL SUNDAY TICKET app. Whether you're a Cowboys fan living in Colorado, a displaced Steelers fan in Syracuse or a member of the Raider Nation in Raleigh, NFL SUNDAY TICKET MAX lets you follow your favorite team no matter where you live. With your DIRECTV NFL SUNDAY TICKET MAX subscription, download the NFL SUNDAY TICKET app to watch live games on any device â including your phone or tablet. You'll never miss a big play or game, even when you're nowhere near a TV!Application features include: Live Streaming Video: Enjoy every NFL SUNDAY TICKET game, plus the RED ZONE CHANNELÂ®. Instant Highlights: Relive the big moments. See all the big plays from every game, in near real-time. Fantasy Football Integration â Follow your NFL.com fantasy team while you watch your gameBig Play Alerts â Never miss a big play with on screen alertsSocial Sharing â Post comments to your social network and let your voice be heard Scores, Status, and Schedule: See scores and game status for the current week's completed and in-progress games. Check the schedule for the upcoming games. Instant Stats: An indispensable feature for fantasy footballers. Track your favorite players' performance with a touch. Get game and player stats instantly for each game. NOTE: SUNDAY TICKET is available for customers only in U.S. territories.  A DIRECTV.com account and SUNDAY TICKET MAX subscription is required to watch live video.   Blackout rules and conditions apply as stipulated by the NFL.  Streaming is available for Sunday Ticket games only. Sunday night, Monday, Thursday and Saturday games are not part of Sunday Ticket and therefore not eligible for streaming. Highlights and Shortcuts are available until 12am ET each Wednesday. Use of the DIRECTV NFL SUNDAY TICKETÂ® app by DIRECTV customers is subject to DIRECTVâs Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy (available on the DIRECTV Website).

reviews.comment: Direct TV fails again. Three years in a row. Missed almost the entire day of the games on Nexus 7 and iPad. There support lines busy all afternoon. Clearly Direct TV can\'t handle this.
reviews.author: Rich Puderbaugh

reviews.title: For Galaxy Note 10.1
reviews.comment: This app will only broadcast games held on a SUNDAY that ARE NOT nationally televised or locally blacked out. Plus you must have a subscription to Sunday Ticket MAX(not just Sunday Ticket) to watch on anything other than a TV. With that being said this app is awesome. Leaps and bounds in improvements on last year\'s app. Crystal clear hi-def with the option to either watch in full screen or 2/3rd\'s screen surrounded by other games/teams/players stats. Couldn\'t be happier!
reviews.author: Ryan Briggs

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Constantly locks up and crashes on my Nexuys7 with Android 4.3. Incredibly disappointed
reviews.author: David Kowalczyk

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: I understand I have to have Sunday ticket max to stream! I hate that it pops up every time you change games. Also why bother having a highlight tab I\'d you never make highlights available. FAIL!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Liam Rowin

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.comment: I have an Asus Google Nexus 7 tablet running 4.3.   Video is non existent.  A short burst of audio after choosing game to watch then app freezes.  Don\'t waste your time.  Too buggy.
reviews.author: Phillip Fontenot

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: The other app doesn\'t work on my Asus Nexus 7, but the tablet version works :-) GO MIAMI!
reviews.author: Caleb House

reviews.title: Not Great
reviews.comment: I have to agree with everyone else.  It hangs, it crashes and if your game is local you can\'t get the game.  I had hoped to use this program while at work to watch the Patriots play.  The need to watch it online is because I don\'t have a TV at work.  Apparently due to zip code, if it is available on TV it is blocked on this app.  Kind of sucks!!!! If I was able to watch it on TV I wouldn\'t need the app!!!  Otherwise, this app still sucks!!! You have to reboot constantly!!!!! I wish I could give it a ZERO!!!!!  I have used this both on a Motorola Xoom and a Nexus (first gen) 7.  Both do the same thing.  Its definitely the app.
reviews.author: Charlene Casey

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: This app worked well last season. Now I cannot see anything live since the video won\'t load.
reviews.author: Rytch Circelli

reviews.title: Not every game
reviews.comment: You do not get every game, you only get the games sold out or not on local TV. I want my $40 back. They lie.
reviews.author: don harrison

reviews.title: Nexus 7 2nd Generation
reviews.comment: Everything works like butter great job
reviews.author: Rafael Rodriguez

reviews.title: Has to install and uninstall but works now.
reviews.comment: Works now after installing multiple times. Nexus 7(2013)
reviews.author: Sam H.

reviews.comment: Will not install. Very frustrating. Has been stuck for 2 hours. Other apps install fine.
reviews.author: Nicholas Persichilli

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: It won\'t even load on my phone. Even afterwards installing and uninstalling
reviews.author: melissa poppe

reviews.comment: Better than expected
reviews.author: Matt Davis

reviews.title: Works on my Tab 2 but not my S4.
reviews.comment: App won\'t load on my S4.
reviews.author: Marcus McDuffie

reviews.title: Please fix issues
reviews.comment: Not worth the change in your pocket
reviews.author: Chris Hughes

reviews.title: Please fix reloading login screen
reviews.comment: Login screen seems to clear out when its activated. Makes it impossible to get both username and password from a password manager. Please fix. Phone app does not seem to have this problem
reviews.author: Derek White

reviews.title: Works like a charm
reviews.comment: Galaxy tab 2 10
reviews.author: Cory Wiggs

reviews.title: Nexus 10
reviews.comment: No video on Nexus 10
reviews.author: Steve Koch

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: When can I integrate my NFL fantasy team like the update says I can? I log in, the video plays, then brings me back to the login page. Useless right now.
reviews.author: Audrey Barrow
